posts.post_content:
I'm looking to downgrade my SGC 50 T205 Raymond and SGC 60 T205 Frick to help finish other projects.  I'm looking to trade these two for lower grades and cash.  Make your best offer.  The only stipulation for the downgrade is I will not accept anything lower than a 30/2.  Both are super nice and hard to find in higher grades.  I will be more than happy to provide pictures of the back if requested via email.

r/
Frank

Hi Frank,

How about a trade for these two and some cash? If interested, please contact me.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/808/frick.jpg/][IMG]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/4296/frick.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Turner Engle

Frank,

Please let us know if you are interested in completing the T205 Bugs Raymond and Frick request. 


Matt Engle
